name: Qstore4s
body:
### Welcome to QStore4S.
QStore4S uses the open-source graph database Neo4j to store quadruples. The application is implemented using the Spring MVC Framework. Cyper Query Language is being used to interact with Neo4j. The backend support has been provided to different applications by RESTful services.

### Support or Contact
QStore4S is developed by the Julia Damerow, Bhargav Desai, and Veena Borannagowda of the Digital Innovation Group in the Center for Biology and Society at Arizona State University.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
